content:
I apologize, here is the complete revised rubric:

Individual Test Critique Marking Rubric

| Criterion | Excellent | Very Good | Good | Adequate | Poor |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Commentary on intended use of the test | The critique provides an insightful and sophisticated analysis of the test's intended use, and refers to the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique provides a clear and well-informed analysis of the test's intended use, and refers to the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique provides a reasonable analysis of the test's intended use, and refers to the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique provides a basic analysis of the test's intended use, but does not refer to the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique provides a superficial or incomplete analysis of the test's intended use. |
| Research quality | The critique provides a thorough and well-crafted review of the published literature about the target test and potential rival measures suitable for the same purpose. It chooses the most appropriate references and refers to other appropriate measures that could be used to answer the referral question. | The critique provides a clear and well-informed review of the published literature about the target test and potential rival measures suitable for the same purpose. It chooses appropriate references and refers to other appropriate measures that could be used to answer the referral question. | The critique provides a reasonable review of the published literature about the target test and potential rival measures suitable for the same purpose. It chooses some appropriate references and refers to other appropriate measures that could be used to answer the referral question. | The critique provides a basic review of the published literature about the target test and potential rival measures suitable for the same purpose. It chooses some appropriate references, but does not refer to other appropriate measures that could be used to answer the referral question. | The critique provides a superficial or incomplete review of the published literature about the target test and potential rival measures suitable for the same purpose. It does not choose appropriate references, nor refers to other appropriate measures that could be used to answer the referral question. |
| Practical implications | The critique demonstrates an in-depth understanding of the practical implications of the critique for the psychological assessment of Nick. It refers to how problems with the measure may impact on conclusions that may be drawn in the assessment. | The critique demonstrates a clear understanding of the practical implications of the critique for the psychological assessment of Nick. It refers to how problems with the measure may impact on conclusions that may be drawn in the assessment. | The critique demonstrates a reasonable understanding of the practical implications of the critique for the psychological assessment of Nick. It refers to some problems with the measure, but does not fully explore their impact on conclusions that may be drawn in the assessment. | The critique demonstrates a basic understanding of the practical implications of the critique for the psychological assessment of Nick. It refers to some problems with the measure, but does not explore their impact on conclusions that may be drawn in the assessment. | The critique demonstrates a superficial or incomplete understanding of the practical implications of the critique for the psychological assessment of Nick. It does not refer to how problems with the measure may impact on conclusions that may be drawn in the assessment. |
| Quantitative literacy | The critique provides an informative and accurate comparison of the psychometric qualities of the test with accepted standards and with at least one other rival measure suitable for the same purpose. It identifies and explains how the test's characteristics compare with accepted psychometric standards. | The critique provides a clear comparison of the psychometric qualities of the test with accepted standards and with at least one other rival measure suitable for the same |  |  |  |
